issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Now LlapTaskCommunicator always has same number of RPC listener thread with TezTaskCommunicatorImpl. There are scenarios when we want them different: for example, in Llap only mode, we want less TezTaskCommunicatorImpl's listener thread to reduce off-heap memory usage.
fields.summary: Allow user to change number of listener thread in LlapTaskCommunicator

ATTACHMENT ID: 12855670 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Doc note:  This adds *hive.llap.task.communicator.listener.thread-count* to HiveConf.java, so it needs to be documented in the LLAP section of Configuration Properties.

* [Configuration Properties -- LLAP | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-LLAP]

Added a TODOC2.2 label.
